storyline.content: Hi. I am main_hero. I’m starting this file cuz I need to save my thoughts somewhere. I’ll maybe use them for the big blog post. Or a game, like a visual novel, that’d be cool. Stuff in my head just feels too important to let it go like that, you know.
So, a little about me, I am a gamer with multi-year experience, especially in Striking Countries 2, I have more than 1000 hours and, boy, lemme tell you, I am very good in this game, I can show you.
